name: Abjure Foes
trigger: when you present your holy symbol or weapon to overwhelm foes
effects: target a number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum one) within 60 feet
each target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be Frightened for 1 minute or until it takes any damage
while frightened in this way, a target can do only one of the following on its turn: move, take an action, or take a bonus action
